artist: Torii Kotondo; Published by Kawaguchi Jirō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: so-called blue version; head and torso of woman wearing a blue and white patterned kimono and purple, green, white, grey and pink floral patterned obi; shiny blue ground; same image as L2001.372.37 with different colors
marks: 昭和四年十一月 {Shōwa yonen jūichigatsu} (November 1929) 言人画 {Kotondo ga} (picture by Kotondo)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
title: Sash
